name: Slots - Spin It To Become Rich American Millionair
name_original: Slots - Spin It To Become Rich American Millionair
description:
Slots - Spin It To Become Rich American Millionaire provides an amazing hands-on experience, bringing the excitement of real Las Vegas to your iPhone, iPod touch and iPad by transforming your device into a feature-packed slot machine.
Just pull down the dock lever and bring home the thrill of casino enriched with in-app reel-spinning action  

FEATURES:
• Amazing slot machine with different themes
• Just start with tons of free coins
• Real Casino feel
• Beautifully designed and intuitive reels!
• Multilevel video slot machine!
• Win Big with progressive jackpots!

Download this “Slots - Spin It To Become Rich American Millionaire” for FREE today!
